meanings.sent1: The teacher prespecifies the homework assignments for the entire week.
meanings.sent2: She always prespecifies the meeting agenda to ensure everyone is prepared.
meanings.sent3: The fortune teller prespecifies the winning lottery numbers for her clients.
meanings.sent4: His detailed map prespecifies the exact route to the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The recipe book prespecifies the ingredients needed for the delicious cake.

meanings.sent1: The weather forecast prespecifies a sunny day for the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The rules prespecify the maximum number of players allowed on the team.
meanings.sent3: The magician prespecifies the card chosen by the audience before the trick.
meanings.sent4: The contract prespecifies the terms and conditions of the agreement.
meanings.sent5: The schedule prespecifies the time for each activity during the event.
